snippet: In a surprise move, the automaker, which had insisted it needed help to continue minivan production in Ontario, dropped the request, leaving supporters and critics wondering.
abstract: Chrysler withdraws its widely-criticized request for more government assistance in exchange for continuing minivan production in Canada; company will proceed with significant investments in two Canadian factories without financial aid.
lead_paragraph: In a surprise move, the automaker, which had insisted it needed help to continue minivan production in Ontario, dropped the request, leaving supporters and critics wondering.

headline.main: Chrysler Backtracks on Asking Canada for More Cash
headline.print_headline: Chrysler Backtracks on Asking Canada for More Cash
